segment1.title: Desjardins data breach: Quebec suspect arrested in Spain
A hacker, known as Martha Root, takes down a white supremacist dating site live
Cyber Counterintelligence (CCI): Resecurity releases data on John Erin Binns (IRDev)
Ca: Leduc County target of Christmas Day cybersecurity attack
NZ: High Court grants injunction over ManageMyHealth cyber breach
Threat actors insisted that Resecurity’s honeypot was real data. We found no evidence that it was.
Reminder: Survey on threats experienced by journalists and security researchers
Illinois Department of Human Services tightens map security after data incident
SLH claims to have compromised Resecurity, but it looks like they fell for a honeypot
NZ: ManageMyHealth data breach: More than 108k users potentially affected
